text:
1. Hold the cello correctly
2. Position the left hand on the fingerboard
3. Use the right hand to hold the bow
4. Place the bow on the strings
5. Apply pressure and move the bow across the strings
6. Use the left hand to press down on the strings to produce different notes
7. Coordinate the movements of both hands to play melodies and chords
8. Control the speed and intensity of the bowing to create dynamics in the music
9. Follow the sheet music or play by ear to perform specific pieces or improvisations
10. Maintain proper posture and body alignment while playing the cello
